title: Cool Runnings
creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Dawn Steel, Jon Turteltaub, Lynn Siefert, Michael Ritchie, Tommy Swerdlow, Michael Goldberg and Stephen Marsh
brief_description: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

constellations_other.name: No guts, no glory
constellations_other.description: TV arrived just in time for the 1956 Melbourne Olympics. The Olympics crystallise ideas of nationalism, athletic heroism, and controversy, all of which have been explored through countless features, documentaries and TV shows.

creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Pictures, Dawn Steel, Jon Turteltaub, Lynn Siefert, Michael Ritchie, Tommy Swerdlow, Michael Goldberg and Stephen Marsh
description: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.
description_for_label: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.
